MODDIDocumentPublished
Field.Description: The date the document was published. System generated as the current date but can be over-written by the publisher

Field.Name: MODDIDocumentCreated
Field.Description: This is the date the document was created by the author, not uploaded by the publisher. System generated from properties of document but can be over-written by the publisher

Field.Name: MODDIDocumentLastUpdated
Field.Description: System generated from when the document is first uploaded by the publisher and changed if the document is modified or replaced

Field.Name: MODDIDocumentExpiryDate
Field.Description: Set by publisher on up-loading. Defaults to 6 months from date last updated but can be modified

Field.Name: Picture_x0020_Copyright

Field.Description: Alternate text for annotation of images.
Field.Name: AltText
